topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e51e3863687202ca4a0800#post_54e51e3863687202ca4a0800
I wanna use et!

Also, is there a way to turn down the graphics on TF2? Game runs a bit Choppy on my computer.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e51f93636872470b2c0c00#post_54e51f93636872470b2c0c00
Well, when you're at the main menu, there should be an "Options" at the bottom. Click, that, then click the "video" tab. Then tune the Resoultion lower.
However, you can click on "advanced" in the video tab to lower more things to help speed it up.
That's what I usually do, but if there are other ways, I dunno them.
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e523806368724812290e00#post_54e523806368724812290e00
By the way, about the mods. Mods/Reskins will not show on all servers, so it's best to use the testing map to see if your mods work.
To go to the testing area, click on "Workshop" in the main menu, and click on "Test Map" or whatever the name is...
